steps.title: Trail Making Test
steps.detail: This activity evaluates your visual attention and task switching by recording the time required to tap a series of dots in order.

steps.title: Trail Making Test
steps.detail:
After the countdown, tap dots in alternating order between numbers and letters. Begin by tapping the first number '1' followed by tapping the first letter 'A', and then '2' – 'B' – '3' – 'C'… until you reach the number '7'.

Do this as quickly as you can without making mistakes.
